Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Brotherhood" 2002 TV series – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(September 2022)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* ***Brotherhood*** ([simplified Chinese](/wiki/Simplified_Chinese_characters): 有情有义; [traditional Chinese](/wiki/Traditional_Chinese_characters): 有情有義; [pinyin](/wiki/Pinyin): *Yǒu Qíng Yǒu Yì*) is a 2002 modern television serial jointly produced by Singapore's [MediaCorp](/wiki/MediaCorp) and China's Beijing YaHuan Media Co. (北京亚环影音), in conjunction with [Beijing Broadcasting Institute](/wiki/Communication_University_of_China). Starring Hong Kong actor [Jordan Chan](/wiki/Jordan_Chan), Singaporean-based celebrity couple [Fann Wong](/wiki/Fann_Wong) and [Christopher Lee](/wiki/Christopher_Lee_(Malaysian_actor)) as well as mainland Chinese actresses [Huang Yi](/wiki/Huang_Yi_(actress)) and [Hao Lei](/wiki/Hao_Lei), the serial is set in modern-day [Shanghai](/wiki/Shanghai) and [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore), telling of the inter-generational feud between two twin brothers. It stars [Jordan Chan](/wiki/Jordan_Chan), [Huang Yi](/wiki/Huang_Yi_(actress)), [Christopher Lee](/wiki/Christopher_Lee_(Malaysian_actor)), [Fann Wong](/wiki/Fann_Wong), and [Hao Lei](/wiki/Hao_Lei). ## Cast - [Jordan Chan](/wiki/Jordan_Chan) – He Fan - [Christopher Lee](/wiki/Christopher_Lee_(Malaysian_actor)) – He Ping - [Fann Wong](/wiki/Fann_Wong) – Li Ting - [Huang Yi](/wiki/Huang_Yi_(actress)) – Zhou Ying - [Hao Lei](/wiki/Hao_Lei) – Zhou Qian - [May Phua](/wiki/May_Phua) ## Broadcast *Brotherhood* premiered on [Mediacorp](/wiki/Mediacorp)'s [Channel 8](/wiki/Channel_8_(Singaporean_TV_channel)) on 5 May 2002 with a 2-hour special. ## Accolades YearAwardCategoryNomineeResultRef2002[Star Awards](/wiki/Star_Awards_2002)[Best Supporting Actress](/wiki/Star_Awards_for_Best_Supporting_Actress)[Lin Meijiao](/wiki/Lin_Meijiao)Nominated - *You qing you yi* at [IMDb](/wiki/IMDb_(identifier)) This Singaporean television-related article is a stub.
